00098 static void image_info(Scene *scene, ImageUser *iuser, Image *ima, ImBuf *ibuf, char *str)
00099 {
00100     int ofs = 0;
00101 
00102     str[0] = 0;
00103     
00104     if (ima == NULL) return;
00105 
00106     if (ibuf == NULL) {
00107         ofs += sprintf(str, "Can't Load Image");
00108     }
00109     else {
00110         if (ima->source == IMA_SRC_MOVIE) {
00111             ofs += sprintf(str, "Movie");
00112             if (ima->anim)
00113                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, "%d frs", IMB_anim_get_duration(ima->anim, IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN));
00114         }
00115         else
00116             ofs += sprintf(str, "Image");
00117 
00118         ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, ": size %d x %d,", ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00119 
00120         if (ibuf->rect_float) {
00121             if (ibuf->channels != 4) {
00122                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, "%d float channel(s)", ibuf->channels);
00123             }
00124             else if (ibuf->planes == R_IMF_PLANES_RGBA)
00125                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, " RGBA float");
00126             else
00127                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, " RGB float");
00128         }
00129         else {
00130             if (ibuf->planes == R_IMF_PLANES_RGBA)
00131                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, " RGBA byte");
00132             else
00133                 ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, " RGB byte");
00134         }
00135         if (ibuf->zbuf || ibuf->zbuf_float)
00136             ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, " + Z");
00137 
00138         if (ima->source == IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE) {
00139             char *file = BLI_last_slash(ibuf->name);
00140             if (file == NULL) file = ibuf->name;
00141             else file++;
00142             ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, ", %s", file);
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00146     /* the frame number, even if we cant */
00147     if (ima->source == IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE) {
00148         /* don't use iuser->framenr directly because it may not be updated if auto-refresh is off */
00149         const int framenr = BKE_image_user_get_frame(iuser, CFRA, 0);
00150         ofs += sprintf(str + ofs, ", Frame: %d", framenr);
00151     }
00152 
00153     (void)ofs;
00154 }
00155 
00156 /* gets active viewer user */
00157 struct ImageUser *ntree_get_active_iuser(bNodeTree *ntree)
00158 {
00159     bNode *node;
00160     
00161     if (ntree)
00162         for (node = ntree->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00163             if (ELEM(node->type, CMP_NODE_VIEWER, CMP_NODE_SPLITVIEWER))
00164                 if (node->flag & NODE_DO_OUTPUT)
00165                     return node->storage;
00166     return NULL;
00167 }

00173 
00174 static int image_panel_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00175 {
00176     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00177     ImBuf *ibuf;
00178     void *lock;
00179     int result;
00180 
00181     ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00182     result = ibuf && ibuf->rect_float;
00183     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00184     
00185     return result;
00186 }
00187 
00188 static void image_panel_curves(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00189 {
00190     bScreen *sc = CTX_wm_screen(C);
00191     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00192     ImBuf *ibuf;
00193     PointerRNA simaptr;
00194     int levels;
00195     void *lock;
00196     
00197     ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00198     
00199     if (ibuf) {
00200         if (sima->cumap == NULL)
00201             sima->cumap = curvemapping_add(4, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00202 
00203         /* curvemap black/white levels only works for RGBA */
00204         levels = (ibuf->channels == 4);
00205 
00206         RNA_pointer_create(&sc->id, &RNA_SpaceImageEditor, sima, &simaptr);
00207         uiTemplateCurveMapping(pa->layout, &simaptr, "curve", 'c', levels, 0);
00208     }
00209 
00210     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00211 }

00213 #if 0
00214 /* 0: disable preview 
00215  * otherwise refresh preview
00216  *
00217  * XXX if you put this back, also check XXX in image_main_area_draw() */
00218  * /
00219 void image_preview_event(int event)
00220 {
00221     int exec = 0;
00222     
00223     if (event == 0) {
00224         G.scene->r.scemode &= ~R_COMP_CROP;
00225         exec = 1;
00226     }
00227     else {
00228         if (image_preview_active(curarea, NULL, NULL)) {
00229             G.scene->r.scemode |= R_COMP_CROP;
00230             exec = 1;
00231         }
00232         else
00233             G.scene->r.scemode &= ~R_COMP_CROP;
00234     }
00235     
00236     if (exec && G.scene->nodetree) {
00237         /* should work when no node editor in screen..., so we execute right away */
00238         
00239         ntreeCompositTagGenerators(G.scene->nodetree);
00240 
00241         G.afbreek = 0;
00242         G.scene->nodetree->timecursor = set_timecursor;
00243         G.scene->nodetree->test_break = blender_test_break;
00244         
00245         BIF_store_spare();
00246         
00247         ntreeCompositExecTree(G.scene->nodetree, &G.scene->r, 1);   /* 1 is do_previews */
00248         
00249         G.scene->nodetree->timecursor = NULL;
00250         G.scene->nodetree->test_break = NULL;
00251         
00252         scrarea_do_windraw(curarea);
00253         waitcursor(0);
00254         
00255         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE, ima_v);
00256     }   
00257 }

00260 /* nothing drawn here, we use it to store values */
00261 static void preview_cb(struct ScrArea *sa, struct uiBlock *block)
00262 {
00263     SpaceImage *sima = sa->spacedata.first;
00264     rctf dispf;
00265     rcti *disprect = &G.scene->r.disprect;
00266     int winx = (G.scene->r.size * G.scene->r.xsch) / 100;
00267     int winy = (G.scene->r.size * G.scene->r.ysch) / 100;
00268     int mval[2];
00269     
00270     if (G.scene->r.mode & R_BORDER) {
00271         winx *= (G.scene->r.border.xmax - G.scene->r.border.xmin);
00272         winy *= (G.scene->r.border.ymax - G.scene->r.border.ymin);
00273     }
00274     
00275     /* while dragging we need to update the rects, otherwise it doesn't end with correct one */
00276 
00277     BLI_init_rctf(&dispf, 15.0f, (block->maxx - block->minx) - 15.0f, 15.0f, (block->maxy - block->miny) - 15.0f);
00278     ui_graphics_to_window_rct(sa->win, &dispf, disprect);
00279     
00280     /* correction for gla draw */
00281     BLI_translate_rcti(disprect, -curarea->winrct.xmin, -curarea->winrct.ymin);
00282     
00283     calc_image_view(sima, 'p');
00284 //  printf("winrct %d %d %d %d\n", disprect->xmin, disprect->ymin,disprect->xmax, disprect->ymax);
00285     /* map to image space coordinates */
00286     mval[0] = disprect->xmin; mval[1] = disprect->ymin;
00287     areamouseco_to_ipoco(v2d, mval, &dispf.xmin, &dispf.ymin);
00288     mval[0] = disprect->xmax; mval[1] = disprect->ymax;
00289     areamouseco_to_ipoco(v2d, mval, &dispf.xmax, &dispf.ymax);
00290     
00291     /* map to render coordinates */
00292     disprect->xmin = dispf.xmin;
00293     disprect->xmax = dispf.xmax;
00294     disprect->ymin = dispf.ymin;
00295     disprect->ymax = dispf.ymax;
00296     
00297     CLAMP(disprect->xmin, 0, winx);
00298     CLAMP(disprect->xmax, 0, winx);
00299     CLAMP(disprect->ymin, 0, winy);
00300     CLAMP(disprect->ymax, 0, winy);
00301 //  printf("drawrct %d %d %d %d\n", disprect->xmin, disprect->ymin,disprect->xmax, disprect->ymax);
00302 
00303 }
00304 
00305 static int is_preview_allowed(ScrArea *cur)
00306 {
00307     SpaceImage *sima = cur->spacedata.first;
00308     ScrArea *sa;
00309 
00310     /* check if another areawindow has preview set */
00311     for (sa = G.curscreen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00312         if (sa != cur && sa->spacetype == SPACE_IMAGE) {
00313             if (image_preview_active(sa, NULL, NULL))
00314                 return 0;
00315         }
00316     }
00317     /* check image type */
00318     if (sima->image == NULL || sima->image->type != IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE)
00319         return 0;
00320     
00321     return 1;
00322 }
00323 
00324 
00325 static void image_panel_preview(ScrArea *sa, short cntrl)   // IMAGE_HANDLER_PREVIEW
00326 {
00327     uiBlock *block;
00328     SpaceImage *sima = sa->spacedata.first;
00329     int ofsx, ofsy;
00330     
00331     if (is_preview_allowed(sa) == 0) {
00332         rem_blockhandler(sa, IMAGE_HANDLER_PREVIEW);
00333         G.scene->r.scemode &= ~R_COMP_CROP; /* quite weak */
00334         return;
00335     }
00336     
00337     block = uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
00338     uiPanelControl(UI_PNL_SOLID | UI_PNL_CLOSE | UI_PNL_SCALE | cntrl);
00339     uiSetPanelHandler(IMAGE_HANDLER_PREVIEW);  // for close and esc
00340     
00341     ofsx = -150 + (sa->winx / 2) / sima->blockscale;
00342     ofsy = -100 + (sa->winy / 2) / sima->blockscale;
00343     if (uiNewPanel(C, ar, block, "Preview", "Image", ofsx, ofsy, 300, 200) == 0) return;
00344     
00345     uiBlockSetDrawExtraFunc(block, preview_cb);
00346     
00347 }
00348 #endif

00351 /* ********************* callbacks for standard image buttons *************** */
00352 
00353 static char *slot_menu(void)
00354 {
00355     char *str;
00356     int a, slot;
00357     
00358     str = MEM_callocN(IMA_MAX_RENDER_SLOT * 32, "menu slots");
00359     
00360     strcpy(str, "Slot %t");
00361     a = strlen(str);
00362 
00363     for (slot = 0; slot < IMA_MAX_RENDER_SLOT; slot++)
00364         a += sprintf(str + a, "|Slot %d %%x%d", slot + 1, slot);
00365     
00366     return str;
00367 }

00369 /* TODO, curlay should be removed? */
00370 static char *layer_menu(RenderResult *rr, short *UNUSED(curlay))
00371 {
00372     RenderLayer *rl;
00373     int len = 64 + 32 * BLI_countlist(&rr->layers);
00374     short a, nr = 0;
00375     char *str = MEM_callocN(len, "menu layers");
00376     
00377     strcpy(str, "Layer %t");
00378     a = strlen(str);
00379     
00380     /* compo result */
00381     if (rr->rectf) {
00382         a += sprintf(str + a, "|Composite %%x0");
00383         nr = 1;
00384     }
00385     else if (rr->rect32) {
00386         a += sprintf(str + a, "|Sequence %%x0");
00387         nr = 1;
00388     }
00389     for (rl = rr->layers.first; rl; rl = rl->next, nr++) {
00390         a += sprintf(str + a, "|%s %%x%d", rl->name, nr);
00391     }
00392     
00393     /* no curlay clip here, on render (redraws) the amount of layers can be 1 fir single-layer render */
00394     
00395     return str;
00396 }
00397 
00398 /* rl==NULL means composite result */
00399 static char *pass_menu(RenderLayer *rl, short *curpass)
00400 {
00401     RenderPass *rpass;
00402     int len = 64 + 32 * (rl ? BLI_countlist(&rl->passes) : 1);
00403     short a, nr = 0;
00404     char *str = MEM_callocN(len, "menu layers");
00405     
00406     strcpy(str, "Pass %t");
00407     a = strlen(str);
00408     
00409     /* rendered results don't have a Combined pass */
00410     if (rl == NULL || rl->rectf) {
00411         a += sprintf(str + a, "|Combined %%x0");
00412         nr = 1;
00413     }
00414     
00415     if (rl)
00416         for (rpass = rl->passes.first; rpass; rpass = rpass->next, nr++)
00417             a += sprintf(str + a, "|%s %%x%d", rpass->name, nr);
00418     
00419     if (*curpass >= nr)
00420         *curpass = 0;
00421     
00422     return str;
00423 }

00425 static void set_frames_cb(bContext *C, void *ima_v, void *iuser_v)
00426 {
00427     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00428     Image *ima = ima_v;
00429     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00430     
00431     if (ima->anim) {
00432         iuser->frames = IMB_anim_get_duration(ima->anim, IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN);
00433         BKE_image_user_calc_frame(iuser, scene->r.cfra, 0);
00434     }
00435 }

00437 /* 5 layer button callbacks... */
00438 static void image_multi_cb(bContext *C, void *rr_v, void *iuser_v) 
00439 {
00440     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00441 
00442     BKE_image_multilayer_index(rr_v, iuser); 
00443     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE | ND_DRAW, NULL);
00444 }
00445 static void image_multi_inclay_cb(bContext *C, void *rr_v, void *iuser_v) 
00446 {
00447     RenderResult *rr = rr_v;
00448     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00449     int tot = BLI_countlist(&rr->layers);
00450 
00451     if (rr->rectf || rr->rect32)
00452         tot++;  /* fake compo/sequencer layer */
00453 
00454     if (iuser->layer < tot - 1) {
00455         iuser->layer++;
00456         BKE_image_multilayer_index(rr, iuser); 
00457         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE | ND_DRAW, NULL);
00458     }
00459 }
00460 static void image_multi_declay_cb(bContext *C, void *rr_v, void *iuser_v) 
00461 {
00462     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00463 
00464     if (iuser->layer > 0) {
00465         iuser->layer--;
00466         BKE_image_multilayer_index(rr_v, iuser); 
00467         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE | ND_DRAW, NULL);
00468     }
00469 }
00470 static void image_multi_incpass_cb(bContext *C, void *rr_v, void *iuser_v) 
00471 {
00472     RenderResult *rr = rr_v;
00473     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00474     RenderLayer *rl = BLI_findlink(&rr->layers, iuser->layer);
00475 
00476     if (rl) {
00477         int tot = BLI_countlist(&rl->passes);
00478 
00479         if (rr->rectf || rr->rect32)
00480             tot++;  /* fake compo/sequencer layer */
00481 
00482         if (iuser->pass < tot - 1) {
00483             iuser->pass++;
00484             BKE_image_multilayer_index(rr, iuser); 
00485             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE | ND_DRAW, NULL);
00486         }
00487     }
00488 }
00489 static void image_multi_decpass_cb(bContext *C, void *rr_v, void *iuser_v) 
00490 {
00491     ImageUser *iuser = iuser_v;
00492 
00493     if (iuser->pass > 0) {
00494         iuser->pass--;
00495         BKE_image_multilayer_index(rr_v, iuser); 
00496         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE | ND_DRAW, NULL);
00497     }
00498 }

00517 static void uiblock_layer_pass_buttons(uiLayout *layout, RenderResult *rr, ImageUser *iuser, int w, short *render_slot)
00518 {
00519     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00520     uiBut *but;
00521     RenderLayer *rl = NULL;
00522     int wmenu1, wmenu2, wmenu3, layer;
00523     char *strp;
00524 
00525     uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00526 
00527     /* layer menu is 1/3 larger than pass */
00528     wmenu1 = (2 * w) / 5;
00529     wmenu2 = (3 * w) / 5;
00530     wmenu3 = (3 * w) / 6;
00531     
00532     /* menu buts */
00533     if (render_slot) {
00534         strp = slot_menu();
00535         but = uiDefButS(block, MENU, 0, strp,                   0, 0, wmenu1, UI_UNIT_Y, render_slot, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Select Slot");
00536         uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_cb, rr, iuser);
00537         MEM_freeN(strp);
00538     }
00539 
00540     if (rr) {
00541         strp = layer_menu(rr, &iuser->layer);
00542         but = uiDefButS(block, MENU, 0, strp,                   0, 0, wmenu2, UI_UNIT_Y, &iuser->layer, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Select Layer");
00543         uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_cb, rr, iuser);
00544         MEM_freeN(strp);
00545 
00546         layer = iuser->layer;
00547         if (rr->rectf || rr->rect32)
00548             layer--;  /* fake compo/sequencer layer */
00549         
00550         rl = BLI_findlink(&rr->layers, layer); /* return NULL is meant to be */
00551         strp = pass_menu(rl, &iuser->pass);
00552         but = uiDefButS(block, MENU, 0, strp,                   0, 0, wmenu3, UI_UNIT_Y, &iuser->pass, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Select Pass");
00553         uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_cb, rr, iuser);
00554         MEM_freeN(strp);    
00555     }
00556 }
00557 
00558 static void uiblock_layer_pass_arrow_buttons(uiLayout *layout, RenderResult *rr, ImageUser *iuser, short *render_slot)
00559 {
00560     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00561     uiLayout *row;
00562     uiBut *but;
00563     const float dpi_fac = UI_DPI_FAC;
00564     
00565     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00566 
00567     if (rr == NULL || iuser == NULL)
00568         return;
00569     if (rr->layers.first == NULL) {
00570         uiItemL(row, "No Layers in Render Result", ICON_NONE);
00571         return;
00572     }
00573 
00574     /* decrease, increase arrows */
00575     but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, 0, ICON_TRIA_LEFT,   0, 0, 17, 20, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Previous Layer");
00576     uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_declay_cb, rr, iuser);
00577     but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, 0, ICON_TRIA_RIGHT,  0, 0, 18, 20, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Next Layer");
00578     uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_inclay_cb, rr, iuser);
00579 
00580     uiblock_layer_pass_buttons(row, rr, iuser, 230 * dpi_fac, render_slot);
00581 
00582     /* decrease, increase arrows */
00583     but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, 0, ICON_TRIA_LEFT,   0, 0, 17, 20, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Previous Pass");
00584     uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_decpass_cb, rr, iuser);
00585     but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, 0, ICON_TRIA_RIGHT,  0, 0, 18, 20, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Next Pass");
00586     uiButSetFunc(but, image_multi_incpass_cb, rr, iuser);
00587 
00588     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00589 }
00590 
00591 // XXX HACK!
00592 // static int packdummy=0;
00593 
00594 typedef struct RNAUpdateCb {
00595     PointerRNA ptr;
00596     PropertyRNA *prop;
00597     ImageUser *iuser;
00598 } RNAUpdateCb;
00599 
00600 static void rna_update_cb(bContext *C, void *arg_cb, void *UNUSED(arg))
00601 {
00602     RNAUpdateCb *cb = (RNAUpdateCb *)arg_cb;
00603 
00604     /* ideally this would be done by RNA itself, but there we have
00605      * no image user available, so we just update this flag here */
00606     cb->iuser->ok = 1;
00607 
00608     /* we call update here on the pointer property, this way the
00609      * owner of the image pointer can still define it's own update
00610      * and notifier */
00611     RNA_property_update(C, &cb->ptr, cb->prop);
00612 }
00613 
00614 void uiTemplateImage(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, PointerRNA *ptr, const char *propname, PointerRNA *userptr, int compact)
00615 {
00616     PropertyRNA *prop;
00617     PointerRNA imaptr;
00618     RNAUpdateCb *cb;
00619     Image *ima;
00620     ImageUser *iuser;
00621     ImBuf *ibuf;
00622     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00623     uiLayout *row, *split, *col;
00624     uiBlock *block;
00625     uiBut *but;
00626     char str[128];
00627     void *lock;
00628 
00629     if (!ptr->data)
00630         return;
00631 
00632     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(ptr, propname);
00633     if (!prop) {
00634         printf("%s: property not found: %s.%s\n",
00635                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00636         return;
00637     }
00638 
00639     if (RNA_property_type(prop) != PROP_POINTER) {
00640         printf("%s: expected pointer property for %s.%s\n",
00641                __func__, RNA_struct_identifier(ptr->type), propname);
00642         return;
00643     }
00644 
00645     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00646 
00647     imaptr = RNA_property_pointer_get(ptr, prop);
00648     ima = imaptr.data;
00649     iuser = userptr->data;
00650 
00651     cb = MEM_callocN(sizeof(RNAUpdateCb), "RNAUpdateCb");
00652     cb->ptr = *ptr;
00653     cb->prop = prop;
00654     cb->iuser = iuser;
00655 
00656     uiLayoutSetContextPointer(layout, "edit_image", &imaptr);
00657 
00658     if (!compact)
00659         uiTemplateID(layout, C, ptr, propname, "IMAGE_OT_new", "IMAGE_OT_open", NULL);
00660 
00661     if (ima) {
00662         uiBlockSetNFunc(block, rna_update_cb, MEM_dupallocN(cb), NULL);
00663 
00664         if (ima->source == IMA_SRC_VIEWER) {
00665             ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(ima, iuser, &lock);
00666             image_info(scene, iuser, ima, ibuf, str);
00667             BKE_image_release_ibuf(ima, lock);
00668 
00669             uiItemL(layout, ima->id.name + 2, ICON_NONE);
00670             uiItemL(layout, str, ICON_NONE);
00671 
00672             if (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE) {
00673                 // XXX not working yet
00674 #if 0
00675                 iuser = ntree_get_active_iuser(scene->nodetree);
00676                 if (iuser) {
00677                     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00678                     uiDefIconTextBut(block, BUT, B_SIMA_RECORD, ICON_REC, "Record", 10, 120, 100, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00679                     uiDefIconTextBut(block, BUT, B_SIMA_PLAY, ICON_PLAY, "Play",    110, 120, 100, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00680                     but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_NOP, "Free Cache", 210, 120, 100, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00681                     uiButSetFunc(but, image_freecache_cb, ima, NULL);
00682                     
00683                     if (iuser->frames)
00684                         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "(%d) Frames:", iuser->framenr);
00685                     else strcpy(str, "Frames:");
00686                     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00687                     uiDefButI(block, NUM, imagechanged, str,        10, 90, 150, 20, &iuser->frames, 0.0, MAXFRAMEF, 0, 0, "Number of images of a movie to use");
00688                     uiDefButI(block, NUM, imagechanged, "StartFr:", 160, 90, 150, 20, &iuser->sfra, 1.0, MAXFRAMEF, 0, 0, "Global starting frame of the movie");
00689                 }
00690 #endif
00691             }
00692             else if (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT) {
00693                 /* browse layer/passes */
00694                 Render *re = RE_GetRender(scene->id.name);
00695                 RenderResult *rr = RE_AcquireResultRead(re);
00696                 uiblock_layer_pass_arrow_buttons(layout, rr, iuser, &ima->render_slot);
00697                 RE_ReleaseResult(re);
00698             }
00699         }
00700         else {
00701             uiItemR(layout, &imaptr, "source", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00702 
00703             if (ima->source != IMA_SRC_GENERATED) {
00704                 row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00705                 if (ima->packedfile)
00706                     uiItemO(row, "", ICON_PACKAGE, "image.unpack");
00707                 else
00708                     uiItemO(row, "", ICON_UGLYPACKAGE, "image.pack");
00709                 
00710                 row = uiLayoutRow(row, 0);
00711                 uiLayoutSetEnabled(row, ima->packedfile == NULL);
00712                 uiItemR(row, &imaptr, "filepath", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00713                 uiItemO(row, "", ICON_FILE_REFRESH, "image.reload");
00714             }
00715 
00716             // XXX what was this for?
00717 #if 0
00718             /* check for re-render, only buttons */
00719             if (imagechanged == B_IMAGECHANGED) {
00720                 if (iuser->flag & IMA_ANIM_REFRESHED) {
00721                     iuser->flag &= ~IMA_ANIM_REFRESHED;
00722                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_IMAGE, ima);
00723                 }
00724             }
00725 #endif
00726 
00727             /* multilayer? */
00728             if (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_MULTILAYER && ima->rr) {
00729                 uiblock_layer_pass_arrow_buttons(layout, ima->rr, iuser, NULL);
00730             }
00731             else if (ima->source != IMA_SRC_GENERATED) {
00732                 if (compact == 0) {
00733                     ibuf = BKE_image_acquire_ibuf(ima, iuser, &lock);
00734                     image_info(scene, iuser, ima, ibuf, str);
00735                     BKE_image_release_ibuf(ima, lock);
00736                     uiItemL(layout, str, ICON_NONE);
00737                 }
00738             }
00739             
00740             if (ima->source != IMA_SRC_GENERATED) {
00741                 if (compact == 0) { /* background image view doesnt need these */
00742                     uiItemS(layout);
00743 
00744                     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
00745 
00746                     col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00747                     uiItemR(col, &imaptr, "use_fields", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00748                     row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00749                     uiLayoutSetActive(row, RNA_boolean_get(&imaptr, "use_fields"));
00750                     uiItemR(row, &imaptr, "field_order", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00751                     
00752                     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00753                     uiItemR(row, &imaptr, "use_premultiply", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00754                     uiItemR(row, &imaptr, "use_color_unpremultiply", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00755                 }
00756             }
00757 
00758             if (ELEM(ima->source, IMA_SRC_MOVIE, IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE)) {
00759                 uiItemS(layout);
00760                 
00761                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
00762 
00763                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00764                  
00765                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "(%d) Frames", iuser->framenr);
00766                 uiItemR(col, userptr, "frame_duration", 0, str, ICON_NONE);
00767                 if (ima->anim) {
00768                     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(col);
00769                     but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, 0, "Match Movie Length", 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X * 2, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Set the number of frames to match the movie or sequence");
00770                     uiButSetFunc(but, set_frames_cb, ima, iuser);
00771                 }
00772 
00773                 uiItemR(col, userptr, "frame_start", 0, "Start", ICON_NONE);
00774                 uiItemR(col, userptr, "frame_offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00775 
00776                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00777                 row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00778                 uiLayoutSetActive(row, RNA_boolean_get(&imaptr, "use_fields"));
00779                 uiItemR(row, userptr, "fields_per_frame", 0, "Fields", ICON_NONE);
00780                 uiItemR(col, userptr, "use_auto_refresh", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00781                 uiItemR(col, userptr, "use_cyclic", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00782             }
00783             else if (ima->source == IMA_SRC_GENERATED) {
00784                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
00785 
00786                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00787                 uiItemR(col, &imaptr, "generated_width", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
00788                 uiItemR(col, &imaptr, "generated_height", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
00789                 uiItemR(col, &imaptr, "use_generated_float", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00790 
00791                 uiItemR(split, &imaptr, "generated_type", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00792             }
00793 
00794         }
00795 
00796         uiBlockSetNFunc(block, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00797     }
00798 
00799     MEM_freeN(cb);
00800 }
00801 
00802 void uiTemplateImageSettings(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *imfptr)
00803 {
00804     ImageFormatData *imf = imfptr->data;
00805     ID *id = imfptr->id.data;
00806     const int depth_ok = BKE_imtype_valid_depths(imf->imtype);
00807     /* some settings depend on this being a scene thats rendered */
00808     const short is_render_out = (id && GS(id->name) == ID_SCE);
00809 
00810     uiLayout *col, *row, *split, *sub;
00811 
00812     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
00813 
00814     split = uiLayoutSplit(col, 0.5f, 0);
00815     
00816     uiItemR(split, imfptr, "file_format", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00817     sub = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
00818     uiItemR(sub, imfptr, "color_mode", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, "Color", ICON_NONE);
00819 
00820     /* only display depth setting if multiple depths can be used */
00821     if ((ELEM6(depth_ok,
00822                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_1,
00823                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_8,
00824                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_12,
00825                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_16,
00826                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_24,
00827                R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_32)) == 0)
00828     {
00829         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00830         uiItemR(row, imfptr, "color_depth", UI_ITEM_R_EXPAND, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00831     }
00832 
00833     if (BKE_imtype_supports_quality(imf->imtype)) {
00834         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "quality", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00835     }
00836 
00837     if (BKE_imtype_supports_compress(imf->imtype)) {
00838         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "compression", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00839     }
00840 
00841     if (ELEM(imf->imtype, R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR, R_IMF_IMTYPE_MULTILAYER)) {
00842         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "exr_codec", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00843     }
00844     
00845     row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00846     if (BKE_imtype_supports_zbuf(imf->imtype)) {
00847         uiItemR(row, imfptr, "use_zbuffer", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00848     }
00849 
00850     if (is_render_out && (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR)) {
00851         uiItemR(row, imfptr, "use_preview", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00852     }
00853 
00854     if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_JP2) {
00855         row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
00856         uiItemR(row, imfptr, "use_jpeg2k_cinema_preset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00857         uiItemR(row, imfptr, "use_jpeg2k_cinema_48", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00858         
00859         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "use_jpeg2k_ycc", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00860     }
00861 
00862     if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_CINEON) {
00863 #if 1
00864         uiItemL(col, "Hard coded Non-Linear, Gamma:1.0", ICON_NONE);
00865 #else
00866         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "use_cineon_log", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00867         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "cineon_black", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00868         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "cineon_white", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00869         uiItemR(col, imfptr, "cineon_gamma", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00870 #endif
00871     }
00872 }
00873 
00874 void uiTemplateImageLayers(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, Image *ima, ImageUser *iuser)
00875 {
00876     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00877     Render *re;
00878     RenderResult *rr;
00879 
00880     /* render layers and passes */
00881     if (ima && iuser) {
00882         const float dpi_fac = UI_DPI_FAC;
00883         re = RE_GetRender(scene->id.name);
00884         rr = RE_AcquireResultRead(re);
00885         uiblock_layer_pass_buttons(layout, rr, iuser, 160 * dpi_fac, (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT) ? &ima->render_slot : NULL);
00886         RE_ReleaseResult(re);
00887     }
00888 }
00889 
00890 void image_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
00891 {
00892     PanelType *pt;
00893 
00894     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype image panel curves");
00895     strcpy(pt->idname, "IMAGE_PT_curves");
00896     strcpy(pt->label, "Curves");
00897     pt->draw = image_panel_curves;
00898     pt->poll = image_panel_poll;
00899     pt->flag |= PNL_DEFAULT_CLOSED;
00900     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00901     
00902     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype image panel gpencil");
00903     strcpy(pt->idname, "IMAGE_PT_gpencil");
00904     strcpy(pt->label, "Grease Pencil");
00905     pt->draw = gpencil_panel_standard;
00906     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
00907 }

00909 static int image_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00910 {
00911     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00912     ARegion *ar = image_has_buttons_region(sa);
00913     
00914     if (ar)
00915         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00916 
00917     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00918 }
00919 
00920 void IMAGE_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00921 {
00922     ot->name = "Properties";
00923     ot->idname = "IMAGE_OT_properties";
00924     ot->description = "Toggle display properties panel";
00925     
00926     ot->exec = image_properties;
00927     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active;
00928     
00929     /* flags */
00930     ot->flag = 0;
00931 }
00932 
00933 static int image_scopes(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00934 {
00935     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00936     ARegion *ar = image_has_scope_region(sa);
00937     
00938     if (ar)
00939         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00940     
00941     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00942 }
00943 
00944 void IMAGE_OT_scopes(wmOperatorType *ot)
00945 {
00946     ot->name = "Scopes";
00947     ot->idname = "IMAGE_OT_scopes";
00948     ot->description = "Toggle display scopes panel";
00949     
00950     ot->exec = image_scopes;
00951     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active;
00952     
00953     /* flags */
00954     ot->flag = 0;
00955 }
